title: Structural, morphological, magnetic and electrical properties of La0.8Na0.2−x□xMnO3 (0.00 ≤ x ≤ 0.15) manganites
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27412-27423
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03519D, Paper

M. Wali, W. Hizi, R. Dhahri, H. Rahmouni, K. Khirouni, E. Dhahri
La0.8Na0.2−x□xMnO3 (0.00 ≤ x ≤ 0.15) manganites were successfully synthesized using the solid-state route.
